attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we be humiliated with low scoring because we do not have powerful neighbours.  If Andy Abraham sang brilliantly for the UK, if Russia had Andy Abraham singing the same song for them... guess what...they would have won!!! its now a waste of UK's time and money.  We need to pull out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
